channel.title: Help please :)
channel.description:
ok thanks for reading my post.
i have a 317 delta, ok have found a non fixed dupe method and was wondering if any one knows how to fix it.
method: open 2 clients log into 2 different accounts. both go into wild and skull one of the 2 accounts. once 1 is skulled range that player till he is almost dead. click the x to logout on the client toolbar and log back in. the skulled player who died is alive in the attacked spot and has items still while a second set is on the ground.
ok so how would i fix this? and yes i have herd of the tut 1 connection per ip but i got errors doing that tut.

item.title: Help please :)
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok thanks for reading my post.

i have a 317 delta, ok have found a non fixed dupe method and was wondering if any one knows how to fix it.

method:
open 2 clients log into 2 different accounts.
both go into wild and skull one of the 2 accounts.
once 1 is skulled range that player till he is almost dead.
click the x to logout on the client toolbar and log back in.
the skulled player who died is alive in the attacked spot and has items still while a second set is on the ground.

ok so how would i fix this? and yes i have herd of the tut 1 connection per ip but i got errors doing that tut.
